pseudocodigo:
mergeSort(int A[], int izq, int der)
begin
    int medio

    if (izq < der) then
    begin
        medio ü°® ‚îî(izq + der) / 2‚îò

        CALL mergeSort(A[], izq, medio)
        CALL mergeSort(A[], medio + 1, der)
        CALL merge(A[], izq, medio, der)
    end
end

merge(int A[], int izq, int medio, int der)
begin
    int n1, n2, i, j, k
    int L[100], R[100]

    n1 ü°® medio - izq + 1
    n2 ü°® der - medio

    for i ü°® 1 to n1 do
    begin
        L[i] ü°® A[izq + i - 1]
    end

    for j ü°® 1 to n2 do
    begin
        R[j] ü°® A[medio + j]
    end

    i ü°® 1
    j ü°® 1
    k ü°® izq

    while (i ‚â§ n1 and j ‚â§ n2) do
    begin
        if (L[i] ‚â§ R[j]) then
        begin
            A[k] ü°® L[i]
            i ü°® i + 1
        end
        else
        begin
            A[k] ü°® R[j]
            j ü°® j + 1
        end
        k ü°® k + 1
    end

    while (i ‚â§ n1) do
    begin
        A[k] ü°® L[i]
        i ü°® i + 1
        k ü°® k + 1
    end

    while (j ‚â§ n2) do
    begin
        A[k] ü°® R[j]
        j ü°® j + 1
        k ü°® k + 1
    end
end
